Constructor Detail

BoundsArbitraryPlanarPolygon

public BoundsArbitraryPlanarPolygon(MTComponent peerComponent,
                                    Vector3D[] boundingPoints)
A 2D bounding polygon that is defined by the specified vectors. This bounding shape is only suitable for objects that lie entirely in the z=0 plane.

Parameters:
peerComponent - the peer component
boundingPoints - the bounding points

getHeightXY

Description copied from interface: IBoundingShape
Get the height of the shape in the XY-Plane. Uses the x and y coordinate values for calculation.

Specified by:
getHeightXY in interface IBoundingShape
Parameters:

getHeightXYVectLocal

public Vector3D getHeightXYVectLocal()
Gets the "height vector". The vector is calculated from the bounds vectors, representing a vector with the height as its length in object space.

Specified by:
getHeightXYVectLocal in interface IBoundingShape
Returns:
the height xy vect obj space vector representing the height of the boundingshape of the shape
